task.title: Create a tag container
task.shortdesc: A tag container is associated with a digital property.

context.note: Tag Containers cannot be deleted or renamed after they are created.

step.cmd: (Optional) Assign group access to the new container. All groups that have tag management Environment Privileges are displayed in the Container Groups Access list. If a group is selected, the container is added to the list of containers to which the users in that group receive the access defined by Environment Privileges. For example, if the "TM Devs" group has Development privileges and that group is selected on this screen, members are granted Development access to the new tag container.
step.stepresult: Container access can be assigned or modified at any time. See .

step.cmd: On the Container Environment Overview page, click Create to create an initial version in the Development environment.
On the Edit Tags page, define tags to deploy Marketing Cloud products.
Click Save and Deploy, or click Save and deploy the container at a later time from the Container Environment Overview page.
step.stepresult: Check the Status column for confirmation that the container was deployed.
